nodes.text: The T-s9a targeting computer was developed by Sienar Fleet Systems for use in the company's TIE Interceptor.

T-S9a was, during the Galactic Civil War, the most advanced and accurate targeting computers used by the Empire for starfighters, tied only by the TIE Defender targeting computer. The TIE Interceptor was the starfighter that used it as standard equipment, and was the only Targeting Computer that allowed the Interceptor to do complex maneuvers, and still accurately splash enemy starfighters.
